General.Name: Guangdong Rongtai Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Rongtai Industry Co.,Ltd produces and sells chemical materials and other chemical products in China. The company operates through Chemical Materials and Internet Comprehensive Service Segments. It offers amino plastics and composite materials, formaldehyde solution, phthalic anhydride, and phthalate plasticizers. In addition, it also engages in the internet data center business. Guangdong Rongtai Industry Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Jieyang, China.
General.Address: West Side of Jiedong Eco Dev Zone, Jieyang, China, 515500
